entry.title: Gharib84/Dev-news: A lightweight Angular application that integrates with the Dev.to API to fetch and display programming-related articles and posts in a visually appealing interface.
entry.content: A lightweight Angular application that integrates with the Dev.to API to fetch and display programming-related articles and posts in a visually appealing interface.

entry.title: emberjs/data: WarpDrive is a lightweight data library for web apps — universal, typed, reactive, and ready to scale.
entry.content: WarpDrive is a lightweight data library for web apps — universal, typed, reactive, and ready to scale.

entry.title: ngworker/router-component-store: A strictly typed lightweight alternative to NgRx Router Store and ActivatedRoute.
entry.content: A strictly typed lightweight alternative to NgRx Router Store and ActivatedRoute.

entry.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.
entry.content: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.

entry.title: akritiko/ts3pi: ts3pi is a lightweight Google Chrome (and Chromium-based browsers) extension that helps you record, categorize, and manage web pages you visit. Easily export your saved URLs in CSV, JSON, and HTML formats or import a list from a JSON file.
entry.content: ts3pi is a lightweight Google Chrome (and Chromium-based browsers) extension that helps you record, categorize, and manage web pages you visit. Easily export your saved URLs in CSV, JSON, and HTML formats or import a list from a JSON file.

entry.title: vladavoX/env-runtime-guard: EnvRuntimeGuard is a lightweight runtime environment variable validator for Node.js and frontend applications. It ensures that required environment variables are set, validates types, enforces allowed values, and masks sensitive data in logs.
entry.content: EnvRuntimeGuard is a lightweight runtime environment variable validator for Node.js and frontend applications. It ensures that required environment variables are set, validates types, enforces allowed values, and masks sensitive data in logs.

entry.title: Legcord/Legcord: Legcord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.
entry.content: Legcord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.

entry.title: Asad-Ali-Developer/Nesty-Backend: Nesty-Backend is a lightweight library that brings decorator-based routing and middleware support to Express.js, making your backend code cleaner and more structured
entry.content: Nesty-Backend is a lightweight library that brings decorator-based routing and middleware support to Express.js, making your backend code cleaner and more structured

entry.title: Brian-J-Wang/devcl: Developer CheckList, lightweight to-do list.
entry.content: Developer CheckList, lightweight to-do list.

entry.title: alaa-eddine/PineTS: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, port, and experiment with PineScript-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.
entry.content: PineTS is a lightweight, open-source TypeScript framework that recreates key Pine Script™ features and syntax in JavaScript. It enables developers to write, port, and experiment with PineScript-like indicators outside of TradingView’s environment.

entry.content: A lightweight and optimized Discord Bot

entry.content: A lightweight screen recording and editing tool with zoom animations, cursor tracking, and background customization. An open-source alternative to Screen.studio.

entry.title: lit/lit: Lit is a simple library for building fast, lightweight web components.
entry.content: Lit is a simple library for building fast, lightweight web components.

entry.title: canyon/3d-web-viewer: This project is a lightweight web application developed with ReactJS and TailwindCSS. It enables the visualization of 3D point cloud data and incorporates basic GIS viewing features.
entry.content: This project is a lightweight web application developed with ReactJS and TailwindCSS. It enables the visualization of 3D point cloud data and incorporates basic GIS viewing features.

entry.title: mccrosno/cumulus-js: A lightweight web app that provides accurate 7-day weather forecasts using location-based data.
entry.content: A lightweight web app that provides accurate 7-day weather forecasts using location-based data.

entry.title: waiz3ple/fractionability: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting decimals and strings into accessible, screen-reader-friendly fractions. Generate MathML for enhanced accessibility and ensure inclusive fraction display on the web.
entry.content: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting decimals and strings into accessible, screen-reader-friendly fractions. Generate MathML for enhanced accessibility and ensure inclusive fraction display on the web.
